revision.text:
This is a list of the default [[Classes|classes]] available in Doom 1 and 2. For classes from other games, see the [[Classes|main article]].
==Characters==
===Monsters===
{{Class|Arachnotron}} // Arachnotron {{Class|Archvile}} // Arch-vile {{Class|BaronOfHell}} // Baron of Hell {{Class|HellKnight}} // Hell knight {{Class|Cacodemon}} // Cacodemon {{Class|Cyberdemon}} // Cyberdemon {{Class|Demon}} // Demon {{Class|Spectre}} // Partially invisible demon {{Class|ChaingunGuy}} // Former human commando {{Class|DoomImp}} // Imp {{Class|Fatso}} // Mancubus {{Class|LostSoul}} // Lost soul {{Class|PainElemental}} // Pain elemental {{Class|Revenant}} // Revenant {{Class|ShotgunGuy}} // Former human sergeant {{Class|SpiderMastermind}} // Spider mastermind {{Class|WolfensteinSS}} // Wolfenstein soldier {{Class|ZombieMan}} // Former human trooper
===Stealth Monsters===
{{Class|StealthArachnotron}} // Stealth Arachnotron {{Class|StealthArchvile}} // Stealth Archvile {{Class|StealthBaron}} // Stealth Baron {{Class|StealthHellKnight}} // Stealth Hell Knight {{Class|StealthCacodemon}} // Stealth Cacodemon {{Class|StealthDemon}} // Stealth Demon {{Class|StealthChaingunGuy}} // Stealth Chaingunner {{Class|StealthDoomImp}} // Stealth Imp(Doom) {{Class|StealthFatso}} // Stealth Mancubus {{Class|StealthRevenant}} // Stealth Revenant {{Class|StealthShotgunGuy}} // Stealth Sergeant {{Class|StealthZombieMan}} // Stealth Trooper
===The Marines===
{{Class|MarineBFG}} // BFG Marine {{Class|MarineBerserk}} // Marine (Powerful Punch) {{Class|MarineChaingun}} // Chaingun Marine {{Class|MarineChainsaw}} // Chainsaw Marine {{Class|MarineFist}} // Marine (Punches) {{Class|MarinePistol}} // Pistol Marine {{Class|MarinePlasma}} // Plasma Gun Marine {{Class|MarineRailgun}} // Railgun Marine {{Class|MarineRocket}} // Rocket Launcher Marine {{Class|MarineSSG}} // Super Shotgun Marine {{Class|MarineShotgun}} // Shotgun Marine {{Class|ScriptedMarine}} // Marine (No Attack) {{Class|MBFHelperDog}} // Marine Best Friend Helper Dog (The dog is not avaliable in programs similar to Zdoom)
==Explosives==
{{Class|ArachnotronPlasma}} // Arachnotron Plasma Bolt {{Class|ArchvileFire}} // Fire (This shows the fire prior to the attack) {{Class|BaronBall}} // Baron/Hell Knight Fireball {{Class|CacodemonBall}} // Cacodemon Fireball {{Class|BFGBall}} // BFG Plasma Ball {{Class|BFGExtra}} // BFG Hit Animation {{Class|BulletPuff}} // Bullet Puff {{Class|DoomImpBall}} // Imp Fireball(Doom) {{Class|FatShot}} // Mancubus Fireball {{Class|PlasmaBall}} // Blue Plasma Bolt {{Class|RevenantTracer}} // Revenant Missile {{Class|RevenantTracerSmoke}} // Revenant Homing Missile Trail {{Class|Rocket}} // Fired Rocket
==Pickups==
===Weapons=== {{Class|BFG9000}} // BFG 9000 {{Class|Chaingun}} // Chaingun {{Class|Chainsaw}} // Chainsaw {{Class|Fist}} // Punch (yes thats right) {{Class|Pistol}} // Pistol {{Class|PlasmaRifle}} // Plasma Gun {{Class|RocketLauncher}} // Rocket Launcher {{Class|Shotgun}} // Shotgun {{Class|SuperShotgun}} // Double-barreled Shotgun
===Ammo=== {{Class|Backpack}} // Backpack (Increase carrying capacity) {{Class|Cell}} // Cell {{Class|CellPack}} // Cell Pack {{Class|Clip}} // Ammo Clip {{Class|ClipBox}} // Box of Bullets {{Class|RocketAmmo}} // Rocket {{Class|RocketBox}} // Box of Rockets {{Class|Shell}} // 4 Shells {{Class|ShellBox}} // Box of Shells
===Powerups=== {{Class|Allmap}} // Computer Area Map {{Class|ArmorBonus}} // Armor Helmet {{Class|Berserk}} // Berserk Pack (Full Health+Super Strength) {{Class|BlueArmor}} // Heavy Armor {{Class|BlurSphere}} // Partial Invisibility {{Class|GreenArmor}} // Light Armor {{Class|HealthBonus}} // Health Potion {{Class|Infrared}} // Light-Amp Goggles {{Class|InvulnerabilitySphere}} // Invulnerability {{Class|Medikit}} // Medikit(+25 Health) {{Class|Megasphere}} // Megasphere (+200 Health/Armor) {{Class|RadSuit}} // Radiation Suit {{Class|Soulsphere}} // Soul Sphere (+100 Health) {{Class|Stimpack}} // Stimpack(+10 Health)
===Keys=== {{Class|BlueCard}} // Blue Keycard {{Class|BlueSkull}} // Blue Skull Key {{Class|RedCard}} // Red Keycard {{Class|RedSkull}} // Red Skull Key {{Class|YellowCard}} // Yellow Keycard {{Class|YellowSkull}} // Yellow Skull Key
==Props==
===Tech=== {{Class|Column}} // Mini Tech Light {{Class|BurningBarrel}} // Barrel Fire {{Class|ExplosiveBarrel}} // Exploding Barrel(Doom) {{Class|TechLamp}} // Large Tech Lamp {{Class|TechLamp2}} // Small Tech Lamp {{Class|TechPillar}} // Tech Column
===Hell=== {{Class|BigTree}} // Big Scorched Tree {{Class|BlueTorch}} // Large Blue Torch {{Class|Candelabra}} // Candelabra {{Class|Candlestick}} // Candle {{Class|EvilEye}} // Floating Eye above Candle {{Class|FloatingSkull}} // Floating Skulls {{Class|GreenTorch}} // Large Green Torch {{Class|HeadCandles}} // Skulls with Candles {{Class|HeadOnAStick}} // Stick with Impaled Head {{Class|HeadsOnAStick}} // Stick with several Impaled Heads {{Class|HeartColumn}} // Green Pillar with Heart {{Class|RedTorch}} // Large Red Torch {{Class|ShortBlueTorch}} // Small Blue Torch {{Class|ShortGreenColumn}} // Short Green Pillar {{Class|ShortGreenTorch}} // Small Green Torch {{Class|ShortRedColumn}} // Short Red Pillar {{Class|ShortRedTorch}} // Small Red Torch {{Class|SkullColumn}} // Red Pillar with Skull {{Class|Stalagtite}} // Stalagmite (on the ground) {{Class|TallGreenColumn}} // Tall Green Pillar {{Class|TallRedColumn}} // Tall Red Pillar {{Class|TorchTree}} // Small Burned Tree
===Corpse=== {{Class|DeadCacodemon}} // Cacodemon Corpse {{Class|DeadDemon}} // Demon Corpse {{Class|DeadDoomImp}} // Imp Corpse(Doom) {{Class|DeadLostSoul}} // Lost Soul Corpse (If you give it one) {{Class|DeadMarine}} // Marine Corpse {{Class|DeadShotgunGuy}} // Sergeant Corpse {{Class|DeadZombieMan}} // Trooper Corpse {{Class|GibbedMarine}} // Gibbed Marine Corpse {{Class|GibbedMarineExtra}} // Gibbed Marine Corpse 2
===Gore=== {{Class|BloodyTwitch}} // Twitching Hanging Body {{Class|BrainStem}} // Brains {{Class|ColonGibs}} // Blood Pool with skin {{Class|DeadStick}} // Dead Impaled Body {{Class|Gibs}} // Crushed Gibs (Placeable in level editor) {{Class|HangBNoBrain}} // Hanging Body (Missing Brain) {{Class|HangNoGuts}} // Hanging Body (Missing Insides) {{Class|HangTLookingDown}} // Hanging Torso looking down {{Class|HangTLookingUp}} // Hanging Torso looking up {{Class|HangTNoBrain}} // Hanging Torso (Missing Brain) {{Class|HangTSkull}} // Hanging Torso (Exposed Brain) {{Class|LiveStick}} // Twitching Impaled Body {{Class|Meat2}} // Hanging Body {{Class|Meat3}} // Hanging Body with missing leg {{Class|Meat4}} // Hanging Torso {{Class|Meat5}} // Hanging Leg {{Class|NonsolidMeat2}} // Hanging Body (Not Blocking) {{Class|NonsolidMeat3}} // Hanging Body with missing leg (Not Blocking) {{Class|NonsolidMeat4}} // Hanging Torso (Not Blocking) {{Class|NonsolidMeat5}} // Hanging Leg (Not Blocking) {{Class|NonsolidTwitch}} // Twitching Hanging Body (Not Blocking) {{Class|SmallBloodPool}} // Small Blood Pool
==Misc==
{{Class|BossBrain}} // Romero Head {{Class|BossEye}} // Spawn Cube Shooter {{Class|BossTarget}} // Spawn Cube Landing Spot (Spawn these before you spawn the shooter or it won't spit cubes!) {{Class|SpawnShot}} // Spawn Cube {{Class|SpawnFire}} // Spawn Cube Teleport Fire {{Class|CommanderKeen}} // Hanging Commander Keen {{Class|DoomPlayer}} // Marine (Player-Controlled) {{Class|DoomUnusedStates}} // A placeholder for some Dehacked-only states
[[category:Actors]]
